title: WATCH | Unearthing the hidden treasures of France
text:
YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

France is known for its sophisticated cuisine and medieval cities.

There is more to this country than just being everyone's dream destination. Seasoned traveller Alan Fletcher travels to the hidden parts of France that bring more grief than excitement but they are an important part of the nation's history including the German War Cemetery while showing you how to capture one of the worlds most photographed city.

If you are visiting any part of France to avoid your troubles rest assured the photographer takes you on a tour through the capital city of France. Known for its elusive fashion houses, a little shopping spree in Paris might be the pick-me-up you need or leave you regretful after spending more than you intended.

Receive a detailed tour through the intricate parts of iconic France thanks to Alan and his photography skills.

READ: Quick Guide to France: Say Bonjour to your next escape

description: Alan Fletcher is on a quest to unearth some of the more hidden treasures of France along with his trusted director and friend.
